publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2695# Pauline McNeill: Election of Mr Afif Safieh as Honorary President of the Glasgow University Dialectic Society—That the Parliament congratulates Mr Afif Safieh, Palestinian General Delegate to the United Kingdom, on his successful election as Honorary President of the Glasgow University Dialectic Society, on the basis of his presentation to the Society during the 2000-01 academic year, and welcomes the action of the Dialectic Society as progressing the understanding in this country of the plight of the Palestinian people, particularly at this time of great instability and threat to the Palestinian Authority by the actions of the Israeli Government.
S1M-2695# Election of Mr Afif Safieh as Honorary President of the Glasgow University Dialectic Society (lodged on 4 February 2002) Robin Harper*, Marilyn Livingstone*

S1M-2695# Pauline McNeill: Election of Mr Afif Safieh as Honorary President of the Glasgow University Dialectic Society—That the Parliament congratulates Mr Afif Safieh, Palestinian General Delegate to the United Kingdom, on his successful election as Honorary President of the Glasgow University Dialectic Society, on the basis of his presentation to the Society during the 2000-01 academic year, and welcomes the action of the Dialectic Society as progressing the understanding in this country of the plight of the Palestinian people, particularly at this time of great instability and threat to the Palestinian Authority by the actions of the Israeli Government. Supported by: Robin Harper, Marilyn Livingstone, Mr Jamie Stone*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2695# Election of Mr Afif Safieh as Honorary President of the Glasgow University Dialectic Society (lodged on 4 February 2002) Tavish Scott*
S1M-2695# Election of Mr Afif Safieh as Honorary President of the Glasgow University Dialectic Society (lodged on 4 February 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2695# Election of Mr Afif Safieh as Honorary President of the Glasgow University Dialectic Society (lodged on 4 February 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2695# Election of Mr Afif Safieh as Honorary President of the Glasgow University Dialectic Society (lodged on 4 February 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2695# Election of Mr Afif Safieh as Honorary President of the Glasgow University Dialectic Society (lodged on 4 February 2002) Bill Butler*
